name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 74: The Horror Mystery: Sangekikan: Kevin Hakushaku no Fukkatsu
overview: Simple 1500 Series vol. 74 The Horror Mystery The Sangeki Yakata Cabin Hakushaku no Fukkatsu is an adventure game in which the player controls a character that arrives to a small town and there he will meet different kind of people, but soon he will discover that that small town got some secrets hidden, some of them are deadly dangerous. In the game the player will advance through 13 chapters choosing different answers that will leave him to different game endings (some of them are bad endings) so the player have to choose carefully is he wants to advance and complete the game.
